titles.title: Anti-Retroactive Taxation Act
To prohibit retroactive Federal income tax rate increases.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Anti-Retroactive Taxation Act - Prohibits a law which imposes a new income tax rate increase from being applicable to any period beginning before the date of the enactment of such law.
